name: Puschel Platformer
description:
Puschel, also known as Banner (not the scientist with an aggression problem) is a squirrel. Most of the time he is running around, climbing trees and eating food. Today Puschel is very hungry, but there is no food left! He got attacked and robbed by the two headed squirrel recently. This little mutant-bastard stole all his nuts! Someday Puschel will grab his favorite golf club and "visit" that sinful squirrel in  Seattle...

Anyway... Help Puschel collecting some food. This sounds easier than it is, because he lives in a magic forrest! There are giant Ants, colossal Trees. Maybe this is because of the nuclear tests nearby, but let´s call it magic.

The fluffy features are:

  • 9 creepy levels
  • 3 different locations (forrest, tree and cave)
  • the cutest squirrel you´ve ever seen
  • flying acorns
  • killer ants
  • the biggest tree you can imagine
  • pixels, sharp as a razorblade
